de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp

Class SRLSentence

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.Sentence
      • de.uni_stuttgart.ims.nlpbase.nlp.SRLSentence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Sentence>

    public class SRLSentence
extends Sentence
    Extends a sentence to contain Semantic Role Labeling information.
    Author:
    kesslewd

      • SRLSentence

        public SRLSentence()
        A SRL sentence is a sentence plus potentially predicates and arguments.

      • SRLSentence

        public SRLSentence(java.lang.String tokenizedString)
        A SRL sentence is a sentence plus potentially predicates and arguments. Add all words from String (assume the string is tokenized)
        Parameters:
        tokenizedString - A sentence.

      • SRLSentence

        public SRLSentence(Sentence otherSentence)
        A SRL sentence is a sentence plus potentially predicates and arguments. Add all words and dependency structure from other sentence.
        Parameters:
        otherSentence - A different sentence.

      • SRLSentence

        public SRLSentence(SRLSentence otherSentence)
        A SRL sentence is a sentence plus potentially predicates and arguments. Add all words, dependency structure and SRL relations from other sentence.
        Parameters:
        otherSentence - A different sentence.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Get a new empty list of predicates and arguments.

      • addPredicate

        public void addPredicate(Word predicate,
                         PredicateType type,
                         PredicateDirection direction)
        Add this word as a predicate. Also marks the word to be a predicate and sets its type. Predicates are sorted in order of appearance in sentence.
        Parameters:
        predicate - The word from the sentence that should be added to predicates. No word can be added twice!
        type - Type of the comparison introduced by the predicate
        direction - Direction of the ranking introduced by the predicate

      • getPredicates

        public java.util.List<Word> getPredicates()
        All predicates in the sentence.
        Returns:
        predicates in the order of the sentence

      • removePredicate

        public void removePredicate(Word predicate)
        Removes a word from the list of predicates and unmarks it.
        Parameters:
        predicate - The word that shouldn't be a predicate anymore

      • addArgument

        public void addArgument(Word predicate,
                        Word argument,
                        ArgumentType relation)
        Add a word as argument of a given predicate with a given relation. Will printout error and return if one of the words is not in the sentence. Null is a valid relation type
        Parameters:
        predicate - A word in the sentence.
        argument - A word in the sentence.
        relation - A type of relation.

      • getArguments

        public java.util.List<Word> getArguments(Word predicate)
        Get all arguments of the given predicate. No particular order.
        Parameters:
        predicate - A word in the sentence.
        Returns:
        List with all arguments of this predicate (empty list if there are none).

      • getArgument

        public java.util.List<Word> getArgument(Word predicate,
                                        ArgumentType argumentType)
        Get the argument(s) of this type for the predicate. If there is none, the empty list is returned.
        Parameters:
        predicate - A word in the sentence.
        argumentType - Type of relation.
        Returns:
        argument A list of word in the sentence.

      • getRelation

        public ArgumentType getRelation(Word predicate,
                                Word argument)
        Get the relation between the predicate and the argument. If there is none, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        predicate - A word in the sentence.
        argument - A word in the sentence.
        Returns:
        The relation between these words (or null).

      • wordToCoNLLString

        public java.lang.String wordToCoNLLString(Word word)
        CoNLL representation of a word from this sentence. Includes columns for predicate and argument annotations.
        Overrides:
        wordToCoNLLString in class Sentence
        Parameters:
        word - A word in the sentence.
        Returns:
        CoNLL representation (see Word.toCoNLLString) + predicate-argument info

      • printSRLTree

        public void printSRLTree()
        Print each word from the sentence with id and simple word representation plus short SRL information.

      • toSRLString

        public java.lang.String toSRLString()
        Sentence in one line, pred/args are marked.
        Returns:
        one line with marked preds/args.
